| NaN | This product is manufactured without the use of post-consumer recycled materials. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| NaN | Uncoated PET shows Oxygen Transmission Rates greater than 100cc. Test conditions: 23ºC and 50% RH. Test Method: Mocon OX-TRAN 150 - ASTM F 3985. All OTR test results are traceable to our internal Mocon schedule test report dated 06 September 2022, showing results of 5.488 - LB. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| NaN | Coated PET shows Oxygen Transmission Rates less than 8cc. Test conditions: 23ºC and 50% RH. Test Method: Mocon OX-TRAN 150 - ASTM F 3985. All OTR test results are traceable to our internal Mocon schedule test report dated 06 September 2022, showing results of 5.488 - LB. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| NaN | Metalised Polyester shows Oxygen Transmission Rates less than 0.6cc. Test conditions: 23ºC and 50% RH. Test Method: Mocon OX-TRAN 150 - ASTM F 3985. All OTR test results are traceable to our internal Mocon schedule test report dated 06 September 2022, showing results of 5.488 - LB. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
| NaN | Coated PET has a Water Moisture Transfer Rate of 11 grams. Test conditions: 38ºC and 90% RH. Test Method: Mocon OX-TRAN 150 - ASTM F 3985. All OTR test results are traceable to our internal Mocon schedule test report dated 06 September 2022, showing results of 5.488 - LB. | NaN | NaN | NaN | NaN |
